meanings.definition: The quality or state of being zany.
meanings.sent1: Her zaniness always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent2: The zaniness of the clown made the children laugh.
meanings.sent3: The zaniness of the situation was unexpected but enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His zaniness was like a burst of colorful confetti in a dull room.
meanings.sent5: The zaniness of the party made it a night to remember.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of a zany.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's zaniness entertained the audience throughout the show.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but laugh at the zaniness of his antics.
meanings.sent3: Her zaniness at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The zaniness of the character added a fun twist to the story.
meanings.sent5: His zaniness was contagious, spreading joy to all around him.
